article_title: MSP: No decision on drug task forces until end of 2014
article_text:

article_metadata.author: JOSH BOLLINGERjbollinger@stardem.com

og.description: PIKESVILLE — Maryland State Police will wait until the end of 2014 to decide whether to redeploy upper Eastern Shore drug investigators in a proposed “regional strategy.”
